house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1968 has 4 bedroom(s), 2.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1600 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.view: Bay View, Panoramic View, Valley View
